participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, Emily enjoys engaging conversations and has a passion for music and gaming.
participant_1.background: I enjoy listening to country music. I am in college. I have a crummy job at scrubway. I enjoy playing video games. I live life to its fullest.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and warm-hearted, Jordan loves to express herself through singing and enjoys spending time cooking and gaming.
participant_2.background: I love to sing. I do not treat my girlfriend very well. I am a lesbian. I work in tv. I like to cook breakfast on sundays.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1.
Hi participant_2. I'm participant_2.
What do you do for fun?
I love to sing.
That's awesome! Do you sing in a choir or anything?
No, I just sing in the shower and in my car.
That's still cool. I love to sing too, but I'm not very good at it.
Oh, I'm sure you're better than you think.
Thanks. I'm not so sure about that.
Well, you should give it a try sometime. I'm sure you'd surprise yourself.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem. So, what else do you like to do?
I like to play video games and listen to country music.
Cool, I like to play video games too. What are some of your favorites?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorites are probably The Sims, Mario Kart, and Minecraft.
Oh, I love The Sims! I've played that game for hours.
Me too! I'm always coming up with new stories and characters for my Sims.
That's so cool. I'm more of a builder than a story-teller.
That's cool too. I love to build houses and apartments for my Sims.
Me too! I'm always trying to come up with new designs.
That's awesome. I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too. It's nice to meet someone who shares my love of video games.
